summary.summary_text: Today Speaker is looking at a number of things he's trying. Speaker and his colleagues are trying a new system called combo. It's a system where features go through a contextualized KLT, a low pass filter and a linear output. The waiting scheme used to evaluate the system is 40% 40%, 60% for all the speech that comes with all the languages and the well-match is 40%, medium 35%. Speaker misses 25%.
